alert.note: Alert for Iron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 3:24PM CST until January 05 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM TUESDAY TO 9 PM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 13 inches with locally higher amounts up to 15 inches possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Iron County. * WHEN...From 9 PM Tuesday to 9 PM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Heavy snow Wednesday may create nearly impossible travel conditions for the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest snowfall totals will be in the higher elevations of Iron County along Highway 2.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
